programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Livin' on a Dare: Does being a rebel make you popular? When Julie finds a banned game in the Lost & Found, she realizes it's the perfect way for her to become a school rebel. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: A Very Middle School Scandal: When Lydia's attempts to seed compelling lies about herself, she accidentally starts vicious rumor mill that threatens to ruin the reputation of her friends. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Up, Up, and Vacay: The family win a dream holiday, but have different ideas about where to go. When they can't agree, they enter as two different teams, boys vs girls. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Nothing to Lose Sleepover: Phoebe hosts her first sleepover and is caught using telekinesis to make it fun. She must wear an anklet that prevents her from using her powers. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Visible Brad: Captain Man and Kid Danger are going to need a little bit of magic and some help from an old friend if they want to catch a thief. (S5, ep 27)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: EnvyGram Wall: Captain Man and Kid Danger are guarding Swellview's newest attraction, the EnvyGram Wall, when Captain Man destroys the wall while trying to eliminate a small bird. (S5, ep 30)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: What Hides Beneath: Jasmyn finds a new clue but gets caught red-handed. Oliver stumbles upon a secret in the Hunter House. And Sal and Anika get a surprise when they revisit Diane's house. (S3, ep 17)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Hefty casts a spell which turns him into a colossal nose in 'Who Nose?', then in 'Clumsy Not Clumsy', Gargamel tempts Clumsy with a magic amulet that makes his clumsiness disappear. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Joke's on You: Vanity tires of Jokey's exploding box and decides to boobytrap it with an even bigger explosion. (S1, ep 5b)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Diamondo refuses to give the twins a ride in his spaceship in 'In the Sky with Diamondo', and in 'Best Buddies', things get awkward when Best pretends to know someone he's never met. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs tries to find enough food to feed Pearl as she goes through her 'Growth Spout', and then in 'Stuck in the Wringer', after showering, SpongeBob gets stuck in his wringer.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton disguises himself to get the Krabby Patty formula in 'Someone's in the Kitchen with Sandy', and then in 'The Inside Job', Plankton goes inside SpongeBob's head to get the secret recipe.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin accidentally creates a potion that turns Theodore into a 30-foot giant in 'Theozilla', then in 'Doggone It', all the phones at school are missing, and Alvin is blamed. (S1, ep 21)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Chipmunks argue over who is best suited to lead them to victory in 'Mutiny', then in 'Reality or Not', Alvin is tired of seeing his celebrity status overshadowed by Reality TV stars. (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away in 'Knock Knock, Who's There?', then in 'Pat Hearts Squid', Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, and Patrick begins to take after him.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The school falls in love with Liam's life in 'Hunn-cutt Gems', then in 'Can't Lynn 'Em All', when Lynn is scouted for her athletic prowess, she soon becomes a professional Wrestler. (S7, ep 13)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel faces the Wish Trials in 'Department of Magical Violations', then in 'Teacher's Pal', Hazel wishes her teachers were friends. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Revenge of the Smith: Excited to be honoured for their heroism with a school mural, Phoebe and Max learn that the artist holds a grudge and the tribute isn't what they imagined. (S4, ep 16)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Budget Cuts: When the Vice Mayor cuts Captain Man and Kid Danger's budget to build a high speed railway in Swellview, Captain Man and Kid Danger must find creative ways to save money. (S4, ep 10)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Pizza Dash: The town is under attack when Simon creates a drone that can not only deliver pizzas but has the ability to learn.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Glory Days: Alvin worries the munks are responsible for making Dave boring when they find out he used to be a rock star.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Switcheroo: When Theodore's teddy bear, "Talking Teddy" gets bear-napped, the boys work with Officer Dangus to get him back..

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Paperboy: When Alvin starts stealing the morning paper to sell at school, Dave blames the paperboy and refuses to pay up.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick becomes a superhero in 'Patrick-Man!', and then in 'Gary's New Toy', Gary becomes obsessed with his new red ball, forcing SpongeBob to take drastic measures to intervene.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob is forced to go back to the milkshake academy in 'License to Milkshake', and then in 'Squid Baby', SpongeBob and Patrick must look after Squidward after he hits his head.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Tensions run high when Lincoln and Clyde both get an internship in 'Intern for the Worse', and then in 'The Old and the Restless', Lincoln takes Pop Pop out for a day to remember. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Clyde thinks his parents are having another baby in 'Baby Steps', and then in 'Brawl in the Family', Lori and Leni both buy the same dress, so a fight breaks out in the house. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Simon creates a Super Hero costume for a convention he's attending in 'Munk Man', and in 'Ride Along', when Alvin's bicycle is stolen, he joins forces with Officer Dangus to solve the case. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin begs Dave to spend a weekend alone with him in 'Alvin's Wild Weekend', then in 'For Whom the Bell Tolls', a hypnotist accidentally turns Simon into a bumbling fool! (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: No Country for Old Mentors: Despite hoping to be matched with her favourite next-gen hero in the Superhero Mentor Program, Phoebe chooses her dad, and soon regrets it. (S3, ep 12)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Date Expectations: A desperate Phoebe distracts Max from interfering with her class project by convincing him that a girl wants to go out with him. But then they seek revenge! (S3, ep 11)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Scream Machine: When Charlotte's invention for The Gizmo Show is destroyed and then rebuilt, Charlotte worries that the attention could expose Kid Danger and Captain Man. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Trouble With Frittles: Captain Man and Kid Danger debate Swellview's favourite snack. As tensions rise, they must keep their preferences from affecting their job. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Star family gets trapped in the bathroom in 'The Commode Episode', then in 'Tying the Klop-Knot', Bunny and Cecil need to have another Klopnodian wedding. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Louds' road trip takes them to Hollywood in 'Screen Queen', and in 'Hide and Sneak', the Louds have to avoid the Casagrandes when they visit Great Lakes City. (S7, ep 8)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Lost and Founders Day: Dev's dad, tech magnate Dale Dimmadome, creates an app designed to track kids' wants, but Hazel shows up as an anomaly thanks to Cosmo and Wanda's wish granting. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Great Patty Caper: SpongeBob, Patrick and Plankton solve a mystery on a runaway train.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Thundercover: Max and Phoebe bring Chloe on an undercover mission so she can experience life as a normal kid. When a new supervillain threat emerges, the trio must stay in town for longer. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Lights in the Sky: The rare appearance of mysterious lights in the sky causes Meesha's Grandmother Gillian to go missing in the jungle. Taylor, Nori, and Meesha must search for Gillian. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Live & Dangerous, Part 1: Captain Man and Kid Danger are invited by a famous internet celebrity to attend his party, but they discover the party is not what it appeared to be. (S3, ep 19)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Live & Dangerous, Part 2: When Frankini announces his plan to unmask Kid Danger and Captain Man on his show, Charlotte, Schwoz, Piper, and Jasper snap into action to try to stop him. (S3, ep 20)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Who's Your Mommy?: Max and Phoebe accidentally sell one of Barb's superhero utility belts to a superfan at the family's garage sale, and must get it back before she finds out. (S2, ep 13)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Amazing Rat Race: Max turns Billy into the world's fastest rat. Billy, getting a taste for running at super-speed, decides he does not want to go back to his human self. (S2, ep 14)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Jack the Clipper: When a mysterious new barber attacks Swellview with a string of terrible haircuts, it's up to Danger Force to uncover their identity before their own hair gets chopped. (S2, ep 14)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Sleepover at Sikowitz's: Mr Sikowitz invites the gang to have a sleepover at his house in order to teach them a lesson in method acting. (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Middle School of Rock; After seeing a classmate's newfound confidence after a stint at rock camp, Julie and Lydia sign up for a session that's sure to skyrocket them to popularity! (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger & Thunder Part 1: Captain Man, Kid Danger & Phoebe Thunderman infiltrate a villain meeting in Swellview where the villains plan to destroy Captain Man and Kid Danger. (S2, ep 14)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger & Thunder Part 2: Captain Man, Kid Danger & Phoebe Thunderman infiltrate a villain meeting in Swellview where the villains plan to destroy Captain Man and Kid Danger. (S2, ep 15)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Date of Emergency: Phoebe fakes a romance after feeling left out with her friends all in relationships, but keeping her lie going proves to be harder than she expected. (S4, ep1)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Orange is the New Max: Phoebe worries that Max will revert to his evil ways after he is asked to give a prison talk, but her efforts to protect Max from himself do more harm than good. (S4, ep 11)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: The Great Ping Pong Scam: Tori discovers that her friends have been secretly going to a fancy restaurant instead of playing in an annual ping pong tournament. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Wok Star: Tori helps Jade find a theatre to perform a play Jade wrote. When the sponsor demands changes that will ruin Jade's play, Tori must make things right before opening. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Odd Squads: It's Mapleview Middle's favourite school event: the Astounding Treasure Hunt! Every year, the school pairs off on an epic scavenger hunt. (S1, ep 21)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Odd Squads: It's Mapleview Middle's favourite school event: the Astounding Treasure Hunt! Every year, the school pairs off on an epic scavenger hunt. (S1, ep 21)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Notes on a Vandal: Does helping everyone get better grades make you popular? When the tyrannical history teacher, Mr. Caplan, gives everyone a harsh grade, Lydia vows to challenge hers. (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Pretty Little Choirs: When a mean girl sabotages Phoebe in choir and takes advantage of Max by making him do her homework for her, the twins work together to get even with her. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Paging Dr. Thunderman: Max and Phoebe take Billy to the hospital when he hurts his thumb. They must stop the doctors seeing Max's brain scan which could expose their powers! (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Mr. Nice Guy: A vigilante in a smiley-face mask has been punishing Swellviewians for being rude in public. Kid Danger and Captain Man's investigation leads them to a local TV celebrity. (S5, ep 31)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Theranos Boot: Henry and the other kids destroy Ray's prized movie prop. To replace it, Henry and Jasper travel to an alternate universe Man Cave before Ray finds out. (S5, ep 32)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: The Butterfly Sun: With another stone found and a new riddle to solve, the gang returns to the planetarium, but get more than they were expecting. Will they solve the mystery in time? (S3, ep 18)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Smurfette and Blossom take Grouchy camping in 'Unsmurfable Smile', then in 'Mind the Cat', Gargamel falls under the mind control of Azrael and the Smurfs must help to set him free. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Some LIke It Not: After breaking Papa Smurf's telescope, Scaredy and Hefty disguise themselves as girls to avoid punishment. (S1, ep 5a)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Bester uncovers undelicious ocurrences in 'Donut Disturb', then in 'The Cursed Amulet', Best and Bester dig up Captain Ironfoot's Cursed Amulet, only to find that Belle wants it too. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: In 'Greasy Buffoons', Mr. Krabs and Plankton woo customers with greasy entrees. Then in 'Model Sponge', SpongeBob tries a career at being a model in a kitchen sponge commercial.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward cleans up the city of Bikini Bottom with help from SpongeBob in 'Keep Bikini Bottom Beautiful', and then in 'A Pal for Gary', SpongeBob brings Gary a pet that terrorizes him.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin tells Theodore that he can turn rubbish into sweets in 'Alvin's Secret Powers', then in 'Warbie', The Chipmunks find a baby bird that's fallen from its nest. (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Brittany takes up painting to impress her fashion idol in 'Art For Art's Sake', and then in 'Mancave', Alvin, convinced that Julie and her son are trying to move in, tries to stop it. (S1, ep 25)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a cute but inconvenient companion in 'Lighthouse Louie', then in 'Hiccup Plague', no one in Bikini Bottom is safe from a case of contagious hiccups.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Leni must protect her mannequin friend in 'Bye Tanya', then in 'What Lies Beneath', Dante buries a secret in the cemetery, and must stop the Morticians Club from discovering what it is. (S7, ep 14)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a live dinosaur in 'A Dinosaur in Dimmadelphia', then in 'Fearless', Hazel wishes that Jasmine was fearless. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Nowhere to Slide: The Thunder boys decide to survive 24 hours in the wilderness, while the girls try to bond over some of Barb's favourite farm activities from her childhood. (S4, ep 24)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Toon In For Danger: When Henry and Ray get a copy of the new Kid Danger & Captain Man cartoon and see that it's horrible, they must hurry to fix the cartoon before the big premiere party. (S4, ep 11)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Across the Universe: Alvin bets Bo Carter that alien life exists and only has a week to prove it or suffer embarrassing consequences.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Britt's Picks: Brittany's furious when she thinks Alvin has been writing on her blog and vows to get him back, but was it Alvin?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Queen Bee: Brittany's dream of being a fashion designer turns into a nightmare when she gets a job and her ideas are stolen.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Pack Animal: When Dave tells Simon to get rid of some stuff, a few of his more dangerous experiments end up in the wrong hands.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward finds a good book which happens to be SpongeBob's private diary, in 'Little Yellow Book', and then in 'Bumper to Bumper', Mrs. Puff is again teaching SpongeBob to drive.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab in 'Eek, An Urchin!', and then in 'Squid's Defense', Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Mom and Dad win a trip to a resort and decide to take the kids in 'Suite and Sour', then in 'Back in Black', when Lucy gets a crush on a regular normal boy, her sisters give her a makeover. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln's social standing is at stake when Lisa gets put into his 5th grade class in 'Making the Grade', then in 'Vantastic Voyage', the kids try and trick Dad into buying a cool new van. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin accidentally clones himself in 'Double Trouble', then in 'Liar Liar', Alvin tells a small lie that quickly turns into a huge disaster, dragging everyone into his tangled web. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Brittany is preparing a class speech on inner beauty in 'Suck Toad', then in 'Secret Admirer', Alvin believes that Kevin has a secret crush on one of the Chipettes. (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: He Got Game Night: Hank raises the stakes of family game night to a new high, and each member of the family will do whatever it takes to win the grand prize. (S3, ep 15)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Kiss Me, Nate: Max is nervous when his girlfriend auditions for the romantic lead opposite a cute boy in the school play, and he convinces Phoebe to audition for the same role. (S3, ep 16)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Mouth Candy: Jasper's enthusiasm leads him to send Captain Man and Kid Danger into incidents that aren't crimes. When he's falsely accused and sent to jail, Henry and Ray must get him free. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Gas Or Fail: When Captain Man finds himself trapped underground, Henry must devise a way to sneak out of his school's standardized testing to save Ray. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After Patrick eats life-threatening chum, SpongeBob helps him with his 'Chum Bucket List', then in 'Big Baby Patrick', Patrick devolves back into a baby so he can keep his childhood toys. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Clyde and Nana Gayle are in competition in 'Out Of Step', then in 'Too Cool For School', Lincoln and friends need to get school back to normal when Principal Ramirez implements fishy rules. (S7, ep 9)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Fly: When Hazel has trouble adjusting to her move to Dimmadelphia, she discovers her neighbours, Cosmo and Wanda, are fairies! (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Frozen Face Off: Bikini Bottom prepares for a sleigh race where the prize is $1 million, but plans change when they discover Plankton's scheme to steal the Krabby Patty formula during the race!

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Faulty Powers: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloe's powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. Max thinks he's solved things, but creates brand new powers Chloe can't control. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: An Unexpected Goodbye: The Institute is shutting down and Taylor and Lila are leaving Rock Island! On a final adventure to break into the Institute South Section, they're busted by Raquel. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger Games - Part 1: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe. (S4, ep 1)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger Games - Part 2: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe. (S4, ep 2)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Mall Time Crooks: Phoebe and Max turn a trip to the mall to pick up Hank's birthday gift into chaos, with a run-in with security that threatens to derail their dad's birthday. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: It's Not What You Link: Max and Link fight, so Phoebe helps them become friends. When Link starts spending more time with Max than her, Phoebe's plan may have worked too well. (S2, ep 21)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Alien Zoo: When Danger Force becomes the newest exhibit at an Alien Zoo, Miles must find a way to break them out before they become alien dinner. (S2, ep 15)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: The Great Ping Pong Scam: Tori discovers that her friends have been secretly going to a fancy restaurant instead of playing in an annual ping pong tournament. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Trendship Never Ends: Does keeping up with the trends make you popular? Everyone at Mapleview Middle is buzzing about the latest smartwatch craze that's sweeping the nation! (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Twin Henrys: Henry has Schwoz's shape-shifting android fill in for him at a family dinner so he can watch the MMA fight of the year with Charlotte and Ray. (S2, ep 16)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Grave Danger: When Ray starts behaving strangely, Henry and Charlotte investigate and are surprised to discover what's been causing it. (S2, ep 17)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Ditch Perfect: When Phoebe learns Max's band plans to dump him, she suspects that his superhero training is hurting his friendships. Determined to help, her good deeds backfire. (S4, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: May Z-Force Be With You: Max and Phoebe ask Cherry to fill in after Phoebe injures herself before a meeting with the Z-Force, but a superhero emergency tests their future as crimefighters. (S4, ep 10)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Trapped In An RV: A heat wave hits LA and the gang heads for the beach in Beck's RV. But once there, they find themselves trapped inside as the temperature rises. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Wi-Fi In The Sky: Tori's flight is delayed, leaving no time to finish a school project. She tries to work with them over video chat, but things keep getting in the way. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Personality Test: Lydia and Julie take a personality test to determine if they truly have the personality traits to be a Highly Popular Person. (S1, ep 23)

programme.desc: Grody To The Maximum: Cody gets a super cool new t-shirt. It's so cool that the kids don't even recognise him, so Cody jumps on the chance to leave his old life behind and become popular. (S2 Ep23)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Wiggin' Out: Bridgette donates her hair to a charity that makes wigs for hairless cats and now some classmates want to do the same. (S2 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Upside Of Hunger: Owen has a mishap while baking an upside-down cake and is transported to an upside-down world where he is forced to outwit himself in order to get his cake back. (S2 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Fire In The Hole: Duncan cooks up a nuclear hot sauce to mess with Chef, but accidentally summons Terry Spice, King of the Underworld! (S2 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Tu Ba Or Not Tu Ba: The class tries to help Chef achieve his dream of joining the world's most famous Tuba Band, Tubalicious, only to regret it when they realise how much they'll miss him. (S2 Ep27)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dude Where's Macaw: While trying to defend his elite gamer status, Chef uses an old cheat code that brings a dangerous avatar to life. (S2 Ep28)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Oro's Secret: A blackout halts the Cup, but the Tikis can't wait: Nui is at stake! They go and seek a generator-like crystal in an ancient Aqua base. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: New: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Crimson Moon: Xin Qi needs a vessel like a genie needs a lamp. Tonight's strength-giving lunar event should help. But the Red Moon also causes Shards to rise. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: New: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Jade Infinity: The Crimson Lord completes his Armor. The timing couldn't be worse for L.J. to learn she wasn't destined to be Jade. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: Syren: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Syren in a flooded Paris. (S2 Ep13)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug
programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Sentibubbler: Shadow Moth creates Sentibubbler, a fearsome Sentimonster that will only stop if Rena Rouge betrays Ladybug and Cat Noir! Will our heroes pass this trust test? (S4 Ep14)

programme.title: New: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: The Chosen One: Will Yuga be disqualified for using an illegal card, leaving Roa to reign over Rush Duels? (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Fish Called Leshawna: After eating some mystery fish sticks, Leshawna achieves every little girl's dream and transforms into a mermaid! (S2 Ep45)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Double Oh Beth: With most of the class already gone for spring break, a villain infiltrates the school. Luckily a sleeper agent has been lying in wait. Hold on... it's Beth?!? Oh boy... (S2 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Duncan Duty: When Duncan realises Chef is getting kids to tattle on him in return for chocolate milk, he sees an opportunity. (S2 Ep47)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Encore'tney: When Courtney turns to a magical datebook to help her achieve perfection, she's trapped in a never-ending loop until a friend teaches her a valuable lesson. (S2 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Life Of Pie: When Izzy, Jude and Owen accidentally bring a pizza to life they do everything they can to help it find a new purpose in life, other than being eaten. (S2 Ep49)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Abaracaduncan: When a magic trick goes sideways, Duncan makes a great escape and Harold becomes the target of a Sorcerer Hunt! (S2 Ep50)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Shock & Aww: When Courtney gets the old, gross daycare carpet replaced with a new one, the resulting static electricity has unexpected consequences. (S2 Ep51)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: School District 9: When a career-predicting machine tells Owen he has no skills to offer the world, Owen finds a way to prove the machine wrong in the most Owen way possible. (S2 Ep52)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: The Chosen One: Will Yuga be disqualified for using an illegal card, leaving Roa to reign over Rush Duels? (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Pan is Born! Goku Goes on a Training Journey!: Gohan's daughter is born, and Chi-Chi refuses to let her become a martial artist. Bulma reveals where Vegeta has been training. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Duncan Carving: Duncan takes advantage of a questionable Halloween legend to steal candy from his classmates. (S2 Ep36)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Baby Brother Blues: When Beth is told that the impending arrival of a baby brother is about to ruin her life, she runsaway to find a new family. (S2 Ep37)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Space Codyty: Izzy, convinced that Cody is an alien, embarks on a journey through space to take him back home. (S2 Ep38)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gobble Head: Chef accidentally cooks up a killer cyborg turkey in a failed attempt to get the kids to appreciate him on Appreciation Day. (S2 Ep39)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snack To The Future: Owen wants his favourite treat, 'Jiggle Giggle', so bad that he's uses a time machine to get to snack time quicker. (S2 Ep40)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Me, My Elf, And I: Duncan tricks Chef into taking the class to the North Pole to remove his name from the naughty list. (S2 Ep41)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snow Country For Old Men: In an attempt to win the holidays, Chef brings snowmen to life. But when they turn out to be evil, Chef and the kids have to jingle some bells. (S2 Ep42)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Gold And The Stickerful: Courtney becomes infatuated with a new gold sticker incentive program that Chef introduces to the class. (S2 Ep43)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Be Claws I Love You, Shelley: When Owen brings a lobster in for show and tell, we discover that Chef has a real lobster problem. (S3 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Trauma Rama: Duncan, normally the bad kid, has an identity crisis when his pranks start curing people of their fears. (S3 Ep49)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Doomed Ballooned Marooned: After over-decorating a birthday table with balloons, several kids float away to a deserted island. (S3 Ep50)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Legends of the Paul: Duncan is jealous of Paul's 100-year time out and, determined to be King of the Pranks, has to team up with Paul, learn his ways and double-cross him to become a legend. (S3 Ep51)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Bridgette Too Far: As season three draws to a close, Bridgette becomes desperate to star in an episode. (S3 Ep52)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Duelling Drones: Mouse enters a dangerous Shore Scrubber's challenge, which clashes with Team Tiki's next race. Plus, she's never used Maroro... Will Corto learn to trust her best friend? (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Relay Race: The Tikis team up with the Tao Twins for a relay race, but Monk can't stand the change in his brother's behavior. He ends up quitting the team, leaving behind Sun and Lotus. (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Indigestion: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Sonata in Bear Major: Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano in the garage at any cost, for the Lemmings love using it to make a racket. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae'r Tralalas yn mynd ar daith i'r dref - dewch gyda nhw! Mae cymaint i'w weld yn y dref, ac hefyd yn yr awyr! The Tralalas take a tour of the city and would love to ride along with you.

programme.title: Sam Tân
programme.desc: Mae Norman am greu'r syrcas 'fwyaf anghredadwy' erioed, ond fel arfer mae'n rhaid i Sam gamu mewn. Norman creates the 'most unbelievable' circus ever, but as usual it's Sam to the rescue!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jôcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae brain yn bla ar fferm Magi: all dyfais newydd Jac Jôs helpu i gael gwared arnyn nhw? Siôn helps Magi out on the farm by enlisting Jac Jôs' errant drone to deal with a troublesome crow.

programme.title: Asra
programme.desc: Plant o ysgolion cynradd sy'n cystadlu yn y gyfres hwyliog hon lle mae ennill sêr yn golygu ennill pwer. Primary school children compete to win stars in this out of this world series.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cyfres animeddedig gyda chaneuon a hwiangerddi traddodiadol a chyfoes. Cân sy'n ymarfer cyfri i bump yw "5 Crocodeil". "5 Crocodeil" is a song to practice counting to five.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cyfres animeddedig gyda chaneuon a hwiangerddi traddodiadol a chyfoes. Cân sy'n ymarfer cyfri i bump yw "5 Crocodeil". "5 Crocodeil" is a song to practice counting to five.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Pan mae Betsi yn bwrw swyn ac yn gwneud i Siriol ddiflannu ar ddamwain, mae Glenys yn cipio Llyfr Swyn. Betsi casts a spell and Glenys takes her chance and grabs Spellbook in the chaos.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Heddiw mae Ben Dant yn ymuno á disgyblion Ysgol Gynradd Gymraeg Garth Olwg i greu trysor penigamp. Ben Dant joins the pupils of Ysgol Dyffryn Trannon, Trefeglwys to create a treasure.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Ar ôl i Guto ddweud celwydd sy'n arwain Dili Minllyn i grafangau Mr Cadno, rhaid iddo geisiau achub ei bywyd! Guto tells a lie which leads Dili Minllyn into the clutches of the sly old fox.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Dyffryn Y Glowyr sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Dyffryn Y Glowyr join Pwdryn and Melys to play some candyland games.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Mae'r Cywion Bach wrth eu bodd gyda threnau ac mae eu ffrindiau'n cael hwyl yn gweld trên, yn chwarae gyda thrên ac yn paentio un hefyd. The Cywion and their friends have fun with trains!

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Mae Og yn teimlo'n unig pan mae ei ffrindiau i gyd yn rhy brysur i chwarae ag e. Og feels lonely when all his friends are too busy to play with him.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Er gwaetha ymdrech Mam i gael yr efeilliaid i beidio bod mor wastraffus gyda'r trydan ma'r ddau'n gyndyn o wrando. The two are transported to a new electric world, meeting a new character!

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r criw yn brwydro i achub haid o ddolffiniaid troelli sy'n ymddangos eu bod yn nofio yn eu cwsg. A struggle to save a pod of spinner dolphins who seem to be swimming in their sleep.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Cai a Megan yn edrych ymlaen at barti Calan Gaeaf, ond does dim pwmpen gyda nhw... eto. Cai and Megan are looking forward to a Halloween party, but they don't yet have a pumpkin!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Yn y bennod yma byddwn yn dysgu am sut mae'r enfys yn ffurfio, be sy'n neud y gwair yn wyrdd, am fwydydd lliwgar, a llawer mwy. We learn about the 'Aurora Borealis' - the Northern Lights.

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Penderfyna Sali Mali a'i ffrindiau blannu hadau yn yr ardd. Ni all Jac Do aros i'r tyfu, felly mae'n penderfynu cyflymu pethau! Sali Mali and friends decide to plant seeds in the garden.

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae 'na swn hyfryd yn dod o'r Cywiadur heddiw. Cyw, Plwmp a Deryn sydd yno ac maen nhw'n canu'n swynol iawn. Cyw, Plwmp and Deryn are singing. Can Jen a Jim form a choir too?

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'n rhaid i Gwil a'r Pawenlu chwarae gêm pêl-fasged yn erbyn tîm pêl-fasged Maer Campus. The PAW Patrol and Gwil have to play a basketball against Mayor Campus's basketball team.

programme.title: Ahoi!

programme.title: Olobobs

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi yn darllen stori am 'Folant Fagddu' pan mae'n clywed swn rhuo y tu allan. Digbi is reading a story about a battle against 'Folant Fagddu' when he hears a roar outside.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu

programme.title: Twt

programme.title: Yr Whws

programme.title: Full Moon in Blue Water
programme.desc: 1988. Drama. Directed by Peter Masterson. Stars Gene Hackman, Teri Garr & Burgess Meredith. A lonely widower with a failing bar encounters a bus driver who is determined to turn it all around. [S]

programme.title: My Man Godfrey
programme.desc: 1936. Drama. Directed by Gregory La Cava. Stars William Powell, Carol Lombard & Alice Brady. An eccentric socialite hires a drifter as a family butler, but there's more to him than meets the eye. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Directed by William A. Seiter. Stars George Montgomery, Alan Hale Jr. & Gloria Talbott. Young waitresses at a hotel in the Old West cause problems for a handsome whiskey salesman.

programme.title: Look At Life Battle of the Bulge
programme.desc: 1962. A focus on all the things you can do, if you are really determined, to take off those extra ounces and keep them at bay! Unveiling there is more to the slimming business than meets the eye.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Wyatt Earp Comes to Wichita. 1955. Stars Hugh O'Brian, Don Haggerty & Collette Lyons. When Wyatt Earp takes over as marshal of Wichita, his first challenge is a local group of vigilantes. [S]

programme.title: Strictly For The Birds
programme.desc: 1963. Comedy. Director Vernon Sewell. Stars Tony Tanner, Joan Sims and Graham Stark. After a fortunate gambling win, Terry Blessing's luck runs out when an ex-girlfriend shows up with a surprise. [S]

programme.title: The Girl On The Pier
programme.desc: 1953. Crime. Director: Lance Comfort. Stars Veronica Hurst, Ron Randell & Marjorie Rhodes. Rivalry between a Brighton crooner who has done time and his partner in crime, who is being blackmailed. [S]

programme.title: Vengeance Is Mine
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Director: Alan Cullimore. Stars Valentine Dyall, Anne Firth, Richard Goolden & Sam Kydd. A dying man hires an assassin to kill so he can frame his death on an enemy. [S]

programme.title: The Silent Invasion
programme.desc: 1962. War. Director: Max Varnel. Stars Eric Flynn, Petra Davies, Francis De Wolff. When the Nazi's take over a small village during WWII, a local girl inadvertently falls in love with an officer. [S]

programme.title: The Return of October
programme.desc: 1948. Comedy. Director: Joseph H. Lewis. Stars Glenn Ford, Terry Moore & Albert Sharpe. A young woman must prove her sanity after claiming that a racehorse is the reincarnation of her late uncle. [S]

programme.title: King Rat

programme.title: Genevieve

programme.desc: Join Caroline Munro as she gives us a glimpse of next week's unmissable films. [S]

programme.title: A Rage to Live

programme.title: Look At Life Down in the Dumps
programme.desc: 1965. A focus on the issue of dumped cars, how the problem is being addressed and a look at the dumping of unwanted articles.

programme.title: Fate Takes a Hand

programme.title: A Lifetime Ago with The Baim Collection

programme.title: Life In Danger

programme.title: Three Witnesses
